Title: Have You Seen My Clockatoo
Text:
[Have You Seen My Clockatoo?]
Not lost! Just wanted everyone to see how perfect it is!
(Attachment: A picture of a very ordinary-looking Clockatoo)

[From "EverybodyLovesClockatoos"]
YEEEESSS!! LOOK AT IT!! PURE PERFECTION!!!

[From "JustFiveMoreMinutesPlz"]
â€¦Just the picture alone is enough to make my head ring with that accursed chirping.

[From "LookUpAtTheInstituteSoTearsDontFall"]
How does anyone find a Clockatoo cute? Every time mine shrieks, I feel my thesis deadline creeping closer.
